product_name: Sunlite Utili-T Air Floor Pump - 2013 Overstock
long_description: A biking essential that works with both Schrader and Presta valves, the Sunlite Utili-T Air Floor Pump offers reliable inflation at a great price. Durable steel barrel and sturdy base provide smooth pumping and stability. Includes a Schrader valve with a thumblock and an adapter for Presta valves. Overstock.
short_description: A biking essential that works with both Schrader and Presta valves, the Sunlite Utili-T Air Floor Pump offers reliable inflation at a great price.
